name: Insertion Sort
text: Insertion sort is a simple sorting algorithm that works the way we sort
playing cards in our hands. In every iteration of insertion sort, the
ith element is picked and moved to the sorted subarray [0..i-1].
// Let us loop for i = 1 (second element of the array)
// i = 2. 13 will remain at its position, as all
// elements in arr[0..i-1] are smaller than 13.
// i = 3. 5 will move to the beginning and all
// other elements from 11 to 13 will move one
// position ahead of their current position.
// i = 4. 6 will move to position after 5,
// and elements from 11 to 13 will move one
// position ahead of their current position.
